name: dlt-logs
description: Open DLT diagnostic log and trace files with lifecycle detection, filters, time-sync, etc.

dlt-logs.fileExtensions.description: Specifies the file extensions that can be opened.

dlt-logs.reReadTimeout.description: Timeout in ms until the first re-read happens. Defaults to 1s.

dlt-logs.maxNumberLogs.description: Maximum number of DLT logs that are shown in one page. If more messages do exist a paging mechanism will reload at 4/5th the next chunk. You can only search within that page. Please consider using filter to stay within that limit. Defaults to 1'000'000.

type.description: Type of this filter. 0 = positive, 1 = negative, 2 = marker

enabled.description: Determines whether the filter is currently enabled.

atLoadTime.description: Determines whether the filter is already applied at file open time reducing the amount of msgs to be processed. Default=false

ecu.description: The ECU id to filter for. Ignored if empty.

apid.description: The APID to filter for. Should have 4 chars (less will be filled with \0). Ignored if empty.

ctid.description: The CTID to filter for. Should have 4 chars (less will be filled with \0). Ignored if empty.

filterColour.description:: The background colour used for type marker(2). Any css colour code like #f0f0f0 or 'red' can be used. For more detailed customization you can define decorations and refer to those. Only used with marker. Defaults to blue.

decorationId.description: Identifier of the decoration (id of decorations config option) to use for marker instead of filterColour. Defaults to none.

name.description: Identifier of the plugin. Currently only 'FileTransfer' is available.

enabled.description: Determines whether the plugin is currently enabled.

allowSave.description: Determing whether saving the files is supported. Otherwise just the information of filetransfers is provided. This reduces the memory footprint. Default: true (allow).

keepFLDA.description: Whether to keep the FLDA log messages. Default is to remove them from the logs.

apid.description: The APID to filter for FL* msgs. Should have 4 chars (less will be filled with \0). Ignored if empty. The spec doesn't define any but providing one speeds up parsing.

ctid.description: The CTID to filter for FL* msgs. Should have 4 chars (less will be filled with \0). Ignored if empty. The spec doesn't define any value but providing one speeds up parsing.

id.description: Identifier of this decoration for later reference e.g. in filters.

renderOptions.description: Render options see vs code API DecorationRenderOptions. isWholeLine:true will be added automatically.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
